position: Senior Associate @Morgan Stanley | IIT Kharagpur | FRM Level I

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: •      Formulated a Propensity to Book model: Identifying customers having a high probability to make a booking  •	Conducted market segmentation and cataloged target customer base by collating & analyzing the booking data of 20 lakh+ base users •	Realized a revenue increment of 140% by targeting the top decile users forecasted by the model through relevant business campaigns •	Upscaled the daily average users on all platforms by 56.7% by leveraging the out of sample model implementation results on target users•	Registered a 6.35x lift in the monthly predicted bookings and top one percentile accuracy of 81% by conducting top decile drill down
experience.description_html: • Formulated a Propensity to Book model: Identifying customers having a high probability to make a booking • Conducted market segmentation and cataloged target customer base by collating & analyzing the booking data of 20 lakh+ base users • Realized a revenue increment of 140% by targeting the top decile users forecasted by the model through relevant business campaigns • Upscaled the daily average users on all platforms by 56.7% by leveraging the out of sample model implementation results on target users• Registered a 6.35x lift in the monthly predicted bookings and top one percentile accuracy of 81% by conducting top decile drill down

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Created an evaluation framework for comparing different tools available for speech analytics; developed a design framework for speech to text conversion • Feature list creation and feature extraction from text through in-house NLP algorithm and benchmark the feature output with various paid sources  • Designed and implemented an accurate ‘voice file to structured features conversion’ algorithm and leveraged features in different business solutions
experience.description_html: • Created an evaluation framework for comparing different tools available for speech analytics; developed a design framework for speech to text conversion • Feature list creation and feature extraction from text through in-house NLP algorithm and benchmark the feature output with various paid sources • Designed and implemented an accurate ‘voice file to structured features conversion’ algorithm and leveraged features in different business solutions <!---->

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective
experience.description_html: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective
experience.company: Students'​ Alumni Cell, Office of Alumni Affairs, IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: • Incremented the user-engagement duration on the website by 21% by developing user-friendly   wireframes for company's main website  • Accelerated the hiring procedure by 50% by formulating a new hiring process which enabled smooth data transfer among 4 divisions  • Improved customer feedback by 1.5x; initialized Trainer Research and Development division to    enhance teaching quality of 40+ trainers  • Upscaled the clientele by 34% by investigating the existing customer data to identify the primary    client segment to approach similar leads  • Established 5 KPIs to upgrade and sustain the workflow by formalizing an end to end process and    team structure for the organization
experience.description_html: • Incremented the user-engagement duration on the website by 21% by developing user-friendly  wireframes for company's main website  • Accelerated the hiring procedure by 50% by formulating a new hiring process which enabled smooth data transfer among 4 divisions  • Improved customer feedback by 1.5x; initialized Trainer Research and Development division to  enhance teaching quality of 40+ trainers  • Upscaled the clientele by 34% by investigating the existing customer data to identify the primary  client segment to approach similar leads  • Established 5 KPIs to upgrade and sustain the workflow by formalizing an end to end process and  team structure for the organization

experience.title: Theatrical Practitioner
experience.description: • Member of Pravah: Hindi Technology Dramatics Society, IIT Kharagpur; scripted, produced, and staged 2 full-length productions and 3 street plays • Part of the Bronze winning Inter IIT contingent of IIT Kharagpur at the 3rd Inter IIT Cultural Meet held at IIT Roorkee among 20+ IITs  • Secured Bronze at the annual event Carpe-Diem in 2018 at IIM Kolkata in the Street Play Halla Bol witnessing more than 10 teams as participants
